comments.raw_text: The attached testcase should be self-explanatory.  For some reason, when switching from one option to another, if the -moz-ui-invalid state changes in the process the two options involved are not invalidated correctly.

comments.text:
Created attachment 539875
Testcase

The attached testcase should be self-explanatory.  For some reason, when switching from one option to another, if the -moz-ui-invalid state changes in the process the two options involved are not invalidated correctly.

comments.raw_text: I think there were a bug filed about that at the end of FF4 work. Though, I don't have much time right now to find it back.
